description: Creates a wall of ice which holds back enemies. Targets under the wall are damaged and pushed back.
static.name: Frost Wall

description: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to cold damage and giving them a chance to be frozen by cold damage.

Adds {0} to {1} Lightning Damage to Attacks

static.name: Gluttony of Elements

stats.text: Taking Elemental Damage instead heals you and Nearby Allies

description: Creates a breach, making you vulnerable to its powerful inhabitants.
static.name: Vaal Breach

stats.text: Monsters from the Breach do not grant Experience or drop Items

description: Fires an arrow that explodes, dealing fire damage to its target and other nearby enemies, with an increased chance of igniting them.
static.name: Vaal Burning Arrow

stats.text: {0}% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage

description: Casts a temporary aura that lets you and your allies cast skills without paying their mana costs.
static.name: Vaal Clarity

stats.text: Your and nearby allies' Skills Cost no Mana

description: A sequence of ice crystals erupts from the ground around the caster, damaging enemies and leaving the ground chilled.
static.name: Vaal Cold Snap

description: Spin and attack in place, damaging nearby enemies and pulling others towards you.
static.name: Vaal Cyclone

description: Explodes an unused corpse, dealing fire damage to nearby enemies. Nearby corpses will also explode in a chain reaction.
static.name: Vaal Detonate Dead

stats.text: Explosion deals base Fire Damage equal to {0}% of the corpse's maximum Life

description: Casts a temporary aura that grants energy shield to you and your allies and prevents energy shield recharge being delayed by damage taken.
static.name: Vaal Discipline

stats.text: You and nearby allies gain {0} additional Energy Shield
Your and nearby allies' Energy Shield Recharges are not delayed by Damage

description: Performs two fast attacks on target enemy with your main hand melee weapon, and summons your double for a duration to continuously attack monsters in this fashion.
static.name: Vaal Double Strike

description: Throws multiple traps that explode when triggered, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies and leaving areas of burning ground that damages enemies who walk through them.
static.name: Vaal FireTrap
properties: Trap, Vaal, Spell, Duration, AoE, Fire

stats.text: Can have up to {0} additional Traps placed at a time
Traps are thrown randomly around you
Throws a Trap which uses this Skill when Triggered

description: Launches a series of fireballs in all directions around the caster.
static.name: Vaal Fireball

stats.text: Fires Projectiles at all nearby Enemies

description: Targets an area and builds up a large explosion. The build-up speed is based on cast speed. The explosion occurs after it reaches 10 stacks.
static.name: Vaal Flameblast

stats.text: {0}% more Spell Damage for each stage

description: Hits the enemy, converting some of your physical damage to cold damage. It traps the enemy with you in a circle of ice so that it can't escape. Requires a Mace or Staff.
static.name: Vaal Glacial Hammer
properties: Vaal, Attack, Melee, Duration, AoE, Cold

stats.text: {0}% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage

description: Casts a temporary aura that grants you and your allies the ability to dodge attacks and spells.
static.name: Vaal Grace

description: The character slams the ground with their main hand weapon, creating a wave that travels in all directions and damages enemies. Only works with Staves or Maces.
static.name: Vaal Ground Slam

description: Casts a temporary aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.
static.name: Vaal Haste

stats.text: You and nearby allies gain {0}% increased Attack Speed
You and nearby allies gain {0}% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain {0}% increased Movement Speed

description: Attacks the enemy with a forceful blow, sending them flying backwards. Requires a Mace, Axe, Sword or Two-Handed Weapon.
static.name: Vaal Heavy Strike

description: A chilling circle of ice expands from the caster, repeating from every enemy it hits. If the caster targets near one of their Frostbolt projectiles, it will expand from the projectile instead.
static.name: Vaal Ice Nova

stats.text: Causes smaller novas up to {0} times on enemies hit
{0}% reduced Area of Effect Radius each repeat

description: Discharges Endurance Charges, making the character unable to die for a short time, proportional to how many endurance charges were expended.
static.name: Vaal Immortal Call

stats.text: {0}% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge

description: Infuses your melee weapon with electrical energies as you swing. In addition to converting some of your physical damage to lightning damage, the stored energy is forced into the enemy as you strike, electrically charging them for a duration, during which lightning will arc between them and other nearby enemies, dealing damage. This occurs even if the attack is dodged.
static.name: Vaal Lightning Strike

stats.text: {0}% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage

description: Throws a trap that launches a ring of projectiles through the enemy that set it off, dealing lightning damage to them and subsequent targets and leaving a trail of shocking ground.
static.name: Vaal Lightning Trap
properties: Projectile, Trap, Vaal, Spell, Duration, Lightning

stats.text: Throws a Trap which uses this Skill when Triggered

description: Casts a delayed teleport for nearby enemies to a target destination. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the enemies both before and after they teleport.
static.name: Vaal Lightning Warp

description: Summons fiery elemental shields providing additional armour for a short duration. Whenever you prevent any amount of physical damage from a hit, the shields cause a burst of flame, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies.
static.name: Vaal Molten Shell

description: Fires your wand simultaneously at all nearby enemies, culling those close to death and granting you a power charge for each.
static.name: Vaal Power Siphon

stats.text: Fires Projectiles at all nearby Enemies

description: Fires a large number of arrows into the air, to land at the target after a short delay. Enemies hit by the arrows are pinned in place, unable to move for a time.
static.name: Vaal Rain of Arrows

description: Repeatedly attacks a large area in different directions. Each Vaal Reave that hits an enemy increases the area of effect. The area is reset after a short period without hitting anything. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords.
static.name: Vaal Reave

stats.text: {0}% more Area of Effect radius for each stage

description: A fiery blast removes your energy shield and all but 1 life, exploding outwards to deal fire damage to nearby enemies based on the life and energy shield lost.
static.name: Vaal Righteous Fire

description: Continuously launches unpredictable sparks in all directions that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.
static.name: Vaal Spark

stats.text: Fires Projectiles at all nearby Enemies

description: Sets a marker at a location. While the marker remains, lightning strikes random enemies near it, dealing damage to them. After a short duration, a large bolt of lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers from this skill.
static.name: Vaal Storm Call

description: Summons an army of skeletal warriors, archers and mages, led by a powerful general.
static.name: Vaal Summon Skeletons

stats.text: Can summon up to {0} Skeletons at a time

description: Repeatedly swings a staff or a two-handed axe or mace in a circle, knocking back monsters away from the character.
static.name: Vaal Sweep

description: Throws a spectral copy of your melee weapon. It spirals out in a spinning attack that strikes enemies in its path.
static.name: Vaal Spectral Throw

description: Chance to perform a swift counter-attack against all enemies around you when you are hit. Weapon range increases the area of this attack. Requires a Melee Weapon.
static.name: Vengeance

quality_stats.text: {0}% chance to Counterattack with this Skill when Hit

stats.text: {0}% chance to Counterattack with this Skill when Hit
You cannot use this Attack directly

description: Attacks the enemy with a powerful melee strike. You gain the Fortify buff, granting damage reduction. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending an Endurance Charge. Requires a Melee Weapon.
static.name: Vigilant Strike

stats.text: {0}% chance to Fortify on Melee hit

description: Hits the enemy, adding some of your physical damage as chaos damage and applying poison. Requires a claw, dagger or sword.
static.name: Viper Strike

stats.text: {0}% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage

description: Casts an aura that grants life regeneration to you and your allies.
static.name: Vitality

stats.text: You and nearby allies regenerate {0}% Life per second
{0}% reduced Movement, Cast and Attack Speed
Places a Remote Mine which uses this Skill when detonated

description: Curses all targets in an area, making them take increased physical damage and degeneration.
static.name: Vulnerability

quality_stats.text: Cursed enemies take {0}% increased Physical damage

stats.text: Cursed enemies take {0}% increased Physical damage
Cursed enemies take {0}% increased damage from Damage Over Time effects

description: Fires a projectile and teleports you in the opposite direction
static.name: Wand Teleport

stats.text: Adds {0} to {1} Lightning Damage to Attacks

description: Curses all targets in an area, making them more vulnerable to stuns. Hitting the cursed targets will leech life and mana, and killing them will result in a chance to gain an endurance charge.
static.name: Warlord's Mark

quality_stats.text: Cursed enemies have a {0}% chance to grant an Endurance Charge when slain

stats.text: Cursed enemies have {0}% reduced Stun and Block Recovery
Cursed enemies have an additional {0}% chance to be Stunned
Cursed enemies grant {0}% Life Leech when Hit
Cursed enemies grant {0}% Mana Leech when Hit
Cursed enemies have a {0}% chance to grant an Endurance Charge when slain

description: Dive through enemies, dealing weapon damage. Only works with daggers, claws and one handed swords.
static.name: Whirling Blades

description: Your melee weapon strikes an enemy, converting some of the damage to a random element. Then, depending on the element chosen, it releases an explosion, an arcing bolt of lightning, or an icy wave.
static.name: Wild Strike
properties: Projectile, Attack, Melee, Lightning, Cold, Fire, AoE, Chaining

stats.text: {0}% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire, Cold or Lightning Damage

description: Casts a debilitating effect on enemies in an area, Hindering their movement and applying a stacking debuff that increases the Chaos Damage they take. This effect can stack up to 20 times.
static.name: Wither

description: Casts an aura that adds lightning damage to the attacks of you and your allies, and makes your spells deal more lightning damage.
static.name: Wrath

stats.text: You and nearby allies deal {0} to {1} additional Lightning Damage with Attacks
You and nearby allies deal {0}% more Lightning Damage with Spells
